p: Influenza viruses from Australia were collected by the WHO Collaborating Centre (WHOCC) for Reference and Research on Influenza in Melbourne, Australia. The Melbourne WHOCC receives a subset of influenza-positive clinical samples collected by various sentinel surveillance systems across Australia throughout the year. The samples in this study were typed, subtyped and antigenically characterised by haemagglutination inhibition assay to the vaccine reference vaccine strain in use at the time of sample collection.
